name: Gameboy Advance Video Ratchet Deadlocked PS2 Cutscenes
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Ratchet Deadlocked PS2 Cutscenes
description:
Ratchet Deadlocked is a Spin-off continuation game of Ratchet and Clank series from PS2 on story involved Ratchet,Clank and Al been abducted by thugs hired by Vox among other Gladiators battle each other in DreadZone winning every match to survive for the sake of there lives.

Now i made the full  PS2 cutscene on gameboy advance video to watch.

Hope you like it,Please like,follow,share to your friends and check my other GBA video cutscenes of games  i made!
